update ci_task_history set type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, branch_name = #{branchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sha_git = #{shaGit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sha_local = #{shaLocal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ref_id = #{refId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, provider_kind = #{providerKind,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, build_command = #{buildCommand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pre_command = #{preCommand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_command = #{postCommand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, result = #{result,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, contact_group_id = #{contactGroupId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, track_id = #{trackId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, track_type = #{trackType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cost_time = #{costTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
,p.project_name,g.name from ci_task_history t left join ci_project p on t.project_id=p.id left join app_cluster g on p.app_cluster_id=g.id where t.del_flag!=1
AND g.name LIKE CONCAT('%','${groupName}','%')
AND p.project_name LIKE CONCAT('%','${projectName}','%')
AND t.branch_name LIKE CONCAT('%','${branchName}','%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AND DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i')
order by t.create_date desc
